name: Modern Terrorist Sniper Shoot
description:
Modern Terrorist Sniper Shoot is a striking action FPS sniper game! True 3D graphics and sound effects, allowing you to experience the real sniper experience

Features:
- Various types of weapons, sniper rifles
- realistic 3D screen, show the sound of the environment, the intense fighting effect, make you excited
- First Person FPS Action Shooting Game
- Simple and smooth control
